May 12, 2001 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Second Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-second-section
Test Piece Contest
Firestorm
Ebbw Vale, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: D. Andrews (euphonium)of Ynyshir Prizes - 1st £125. 2nd £75, 3rd £60. 5 bands competed.
Sept. 28, 2011, 12:40 p.m. June 30, 2020, 9:06 p.m.
1 Markham and District Band Robert Burnett
2 Cwmbran Band John Burns
3 Ynyshir Band Alan Gibbs
4 RAF St. Athan Voluntary Band Alan Bourne
5 Ebbw Vale Band Ceri Thomas
Withdrawn Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band Thomas Charlton
Withdrawn Newport Borough Band Alun Williams
Withdrawn Ogmore Valley Silver Band Ivor Barnett
